SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SALESFORCE ORDER MANAGEMENT
Fulfillment Order Fields

The Fulfillment Order object represents a group of products and delivery charges on a single order that have the same fulfillment location, delivery method, and recipient. The products can be included in one shipment or split into multiple shipments. A fulfillment order is associated with one order summary.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
NOTE Depending on your page layout and field-level security settings, some fields aren’t visible or editable.

This table lists the fields on the Fulfillment Order object.

FIELD LABEL	DESCRIPTION
Account	The account or person account associated with the fulfillment order. It represents the shopper in the storefront.
Bill To Contact	The contact associated with the fulfillment order. It represents the shopper in the storefront when not using person accounts.
Created Date	The date when the fulfillment order was created.
Fulfilled Location	The location handling the fulfillment order.
Fulfilled To Address	The address of the recipient.
Fulfilled To Email Address	The email address of the recipient.
Fulfilled To Phone	The phone number of the recipient.
Fulfillment Order Number	The auto-generated number of the fulfillment order.
Invoice	The invoice associated with the fulfillment order.
Is Suspended	indicates whether the fulfillment order is suspended. The default is false.
Order Delivery Method	The delivery method used for the fulfillment order.
Order Recipient	The name of the recipient.
Order Summary	The order summary associated with the fulfillment order.
Pretax Total	The adjusted total, not including tax, of the fulfillment order line items, including products and delivery charges on the fulfillment order.
Product Adjustments	The total amount of the price adjustments applied to the products on the fulfillment order. This value includes adjustments only to fulfillment order line items of type Product Charge. \n
Product Adjustments Tax	The tax on the product adjustments.
Product Adjustments with Tax	

The total amount, including tax, of the price adjustments applied to the products on the fulfillment order. This value includes adjustments only to fulfillment order line items of type code Charge.

Product Adjustments With Tax = Product Adjustments + Product Adjustments Tax


Product Subtotal	The price of the products on the fulfillment order. This value only includes adjustments to fulfillment order line items of type code Product.
Product Subtotal Tax	The tax on the product subtotal.
Product Subtotal with Tax	

The price, including tax, of the products on the fulfillment order. This value only includes adjustments to fulfillment order line items of type code Product.

Product Subtotal with Tax = Product Subtotal + Product Subtotal Tax


Reship	Indicates whether the fulfillment order is for a reshipment. The default is false.
Shipping Adjustments	The total amount of the price adjustments applied to the delivery charges on the fulfillment order. This value includes adjustments only to fulfillment order line items of type code Charge.
Shipping Adjustments Tax	The tax on the shipping adjustments.
Shipping Adjustments with Tax	

The total amount, including tax, of the price adjustments applied to the delivery charges on the fulfillment order. This value includes adjustments only to fulfillment order line items of type code Charge.

Shipping Adjustments with Tax = Shipping Adjustments + Shipping Adjustments Tax


Shipping Subtotal	The amount of the delivery charges on the fulfillment order. This value includes adjustments only to fulfillment order line items of type code Charge.
Shipping Subtotal Tax	The tax on the shipping subtotal.
Shipping Subtotal with Tax	

The amount, including tax, of the delivery charges on the fulfillment order.

Shipping Subtotal with Tax = Shipping Subtotal + Shipping Subtotal Tax


Status	

The status of the fulfillment order. Each status corresponds to one status category, shown here in parentheses.

Possible values are:

Allocated (Activated)
Assigned (Fulfilling)
Canceled (Canceled)
Draft (Draft)
Fulfilled (Closed)
Pickpack (Fulfilling)

You can customize the status values, but you must include at least one status value for each status category.


Tax	The tax on the pretax total.
Tax Locale Type	

Indicates the method used to handle tax on the original order associated with the order summary.

Possible values are:

Gross—Displays most prices and taxes as combined values. Usually applies to taxes like value-added tax (VAT).
Net—Displays most prices and taxes as separate values. Usually applies to taxes like sales tax.

Total Quantity	The sum of the quantities of the fulfillment order line items included in the fulfillment order.
Total with Tax	

The total, including adjustments and tax, of the products and delivery charges on the fulfillment order.

Total with Tax = Pretax Total + Tax


Type	

The type of the fulfillment order. Each type corresponds to one type category, shown here in parentheses.

Possible values are:

Download (Digital)
Email (Digital)
In Store Pickup (Physical)
Retail Store (Physical)
Supplier (Dropship)
Warehouse (Physical)

You can customize the status values, but you must include at least one status value for each status category.

title: Fulfillment Order Object
